skins.selfIntroduction: I am the name ship of the Southampton-class. During the war, I was the only one of my sisters to be sunk. How lucky of me... Ugh. Let's not speak of such unpleasant memories...
skins.acquisition: Good day, Mast- ahem! My name is Southampton. Let me know if there's anything I might do for you. Oh and, not to be a bother, but is there a space here where I can make tea and enjoy some music?
skins.login: Oho! Commander, let us combine forces to finish the day's work as soon as possible!
skins.details: Naturally, I rather enjoy being a knight more than a maid. Losing myself in this music is such a delight. Commander, you simply must try it as well!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, why don't we put a nice old phonograph right there in your office?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The maids would be running ragged right about now... I am terribly unsuited to that sort of work.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Honour guard? Bite your tongue! I am a Royal Knight under the command of King George V!
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you tired? Well then let's lie down for a nap, shall we?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I-I'm not a maid! ... Err, rather, you can't do that to a maid either!

skins.JPClientName: お正月のリトルナイト
skins.shipDescription: Hello there~! Royal Knight Southampton is reporting for duty in a Sakura-style outfit! Hehe, don't you have something to tell me about my new look, like how cute it is? Come on, don't be shy. Speak up~
skins.acquisition: Hello there~! Royal Knight Southampton is reporting for duty in a Sakura-style outfit! Hehe, don't you have something to tell me about my new look, like how cute it is? Come on, don't be shy. Speak up~
skins.login: Commander, Happy New Year! Now it's off to the shrine for a special blessing, isn't it? Heheh, easy does it then.
skins.details: Dressing up all Sakura style has me feeling like I want to listen to some Sakura music. Ehehe.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I think this here is the "Demon Breaker Arrow," isn't it? Seems to be some kind of warding charm... brilliant!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I got one of those omikuji fortunes for you at the shrine, Commander. Let's see, what does it say...?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I find myself wanting to dive into all the girls' festivals now~ What delightful holiday do we have next? I'm so excited!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, come do the shrine business with me! Let's see, I think the Sakura girls did it something like this... you put your hands together, don't you?
